Articles.Content:
Hi all; I have a spaceship in my game and it appears to be glitched; in space/vacuum it constantly rotates on a counter clockwise spin, with no way to sit idle. I have to constantly tweak the craft manually to stabilise its rotation. This is even with SAS enabled. Any ideas why?

Thanks in advance =)

Pic related; the spacecraft in question:

![screenshot0.png](http://s14.postimg.org/hq350vp7l/screenshot0.png)

What mods do you have installed? 

If you have FAR make sure the pilot assist options are off.
Ah it seems to have solved itself; I reinstalled everything from scratch and the problem is gone =)
